Computer.name: Aegis Database Server
Computer.file: Pure software is used to kill people nowadays, I can't believe I gotta need those kind of programs... To hecking do what I want, I'm not a bad person, am I?

TextRecord.Title: Submissions are open
TextRecord.Data: Everyone is welcome to join our first Human to AI test, we'll grant you a ai to work with, and you gotta teach them something in two days, the winners who sucessfully teach the ai what they had to will have a guaranteed job here in Aegis Labs.
